scripts.package: ng-packagr -p ng-package.json && node-sass src/scss/ngchai.scss -o dist/ && cp -R src/scss dist/scss
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): major version release' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): minor version release' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): patch version release' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
